word_mean: 等时的，同时的：同时完成的，指运动和震动的同时发生并同时结束

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent. (in the sense 'equal in duration or in frequency'): from modern Latin isochronus (from Greek isokhronos, from isos 'equal' + khronos 'time') + -ous
